name: Sparky (DomMartin)
description:
This poor girl has been kidnapped and interrogated thoroughly. Unfortunately she didn't have the information they were looking for and on top of that her interrogators left a mess for you to clean up. But fortunately there is time for you two to play together before she is disposed of. Use the left mouse button to turn her last moments into a burning stammering hell.

CONTROLS: Left Mouse Button - Interact
